column1: I am honored to sponsor legislation aimed at supporting working families & caregivers.   No child or parent should be burdened by lack of childcare.  I will always work to improve the livelihoods of families &students in #TX34 especially as we continue to be affected by #COVID19. https://t.co/LnIQWvDPF1

ATTENTION KLEBERG COUNTY: The Texas Military Department is providing free COVID-19 testing November 14th and 15th at the Kleberg County & City of Kingsville Joint Regional Testing Site at the JK Northway Expo Center.

During this COVID pandemic don’t go without health insurance. Open enrollment began November 1. Last year 2 in 3 shoppers could find a plan for $10/month or less after tax credits. See what you may qualify for at https://t.co/jA08M0is4J. #GetCovered

This month @COVIDOversight released a #PPP report revealing @USTreasury encouraged banks to prioritize existing customers for #PPP loans leaving behind minority and women-owned businesses. https://t.co/5ICuqmMl76

ATTENTION: The Texas Military Department is providing free COVID-19 testing October 31st & November 1st from 9:00 am to 4:00 pm at the Kleberg County & City of Kingsville Joint Regional Testing Site located at the JK Northway Expo Center.

ATTENTION Ben Bolt Residents: Free COVID-19 testing will be available tomorrow from 9:00 am to 1:00 pm at Ben Bolt High School Stadium Parking Lot. Please stop by if you suspect you or your loved ones have coronavirus symptoms.

Today is #GlobalHandwashingDay!    Washing your hands is one of the best steps we can take to avoid getting sick & spreading germs to others. As we enter flu season & continue battling COVID-19 it is imperative we continue practicing these simple yet preventative daily habits. https://t.co/ANuJXd5u6K

Did you know that 773 million adults and young people lack basic literacy skills? Adult literacy and education plans were absent from initial COVID-19 response efforts meaning many youth and adults with no or low literacy skills had limited access to life-saving information. 1/2
